changeSet.sql:
-- @version $Id: //hosting-blueprint/B2CBlueprint/version/10.1.1/EStore/International/sql/ddlgen/multisite_i18n_ddl.xml#1 $$Change: 690623 $
create table crs_i18n_site_attr ( asset_version number(19) not null, id varchar2(40) not null, default_lang varchar2(2) null ,constraint crs_i18nsite_pattr primary key (id,asset_version));
